headline: Equinix (NasdaqGS:EQIX) Announces Financial Guidance Raise and Dividend Declarations
summary: Equinix (NasdaqGS:EQIX) reported a significant 5.36% price increase over the past month, strongly aligning with market momentum, as both the S&P 500 and Nasdaq gained. This gain coincides with Equinix's robust first-quarter earnings announcements, where net income rose to $343 million, and higher revenue guidance for 2025, possibly bolstering investor confidence. The affirmed quarterly dividend of $4.69 per share and the positive broader market trend, driven by strong tech sector performance...

headline: Equinix's Q1 AFFO & Revenues Beat Estimates, '25 View Raised
summary: EQIX's Q1 results reflect higher revenues and improving margins due to strong demand for digital infrastructure and services.

headline: Equinix (EQIX) Q1 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Equinix (EQIX) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended March 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.
